episodes.synopsis: Millions believe the Bible is the infallible word of God. But have heavy translation and editing obscured the meaning of the original texts?
episodes.title: Lost in Translation

episodes.synopsis: For centuries Christians, Jews and Muslims have laid claim to the promised land. Can the land of perpetual conflict ever become one of milk and honey?
episodes.title: The Promised Land

episodes.synopsis: The faithful worldwide regard the Bible as divinely inspired. But have parts been removed? And if so, who has decided what portions are off-limits?
episodes.title: The Forbidden Scriptures

episodes.synopsis: The portrait of Jesus we have today comes solely from the Gospels of Matthew, Mark, Luke and John. But can the picture these books paint be trusted?
episodes.title: The Real Jesus

episodes.synopsis: The Bible is filled with ancient prophecies that many claim to be dire warnings from God. What do they have to say about humanity's future?
episodes.title: Mysterious Prophecies

episodes.synopsis: The Bible does not shy away from the topic of sex -- but are its guidelines for human sexuality as straightforward as they appear at first glance?
episodes.title: Sex and the Scriptures

video.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
video.synopsis: This documentary series presents an eye-opening journey through the Bible, examining the many mysteries surrounding its origins.
